title: Tuna Pineapple Meltz
ingredients: ['4 burger buns, split', '30g butter', '1 (185g) tin tuna chunks in olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 dash chilli powder', '50g finely chopped lettuce', '120g grated mozzarella cheese', '4 tinned pineapple rings']
